claim: James Mangold is the director of a movie that featured Sylvester Stallone in a lead role.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The film was based on an off-Broadway stage play that ran for 23 performances at the Martinique Theatre from October 28 through November 15 , 1971 and that featured Sylvester Stallone in a brief role  (  as telephone repairman Mike  )  .
